${ModID}:BloodWall.NAME: BloodWall
${ModID}:BloodWall.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !M! stslib:Temporary_HP. NL ${ModID}:Pickup: Lose !${ModID}:m2! HP.

${ModID}:GoldenPick.NAME: Golden Pick
${ModID}:GoldenPick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL ${ModID}:Pickup: Gain !M! *Gold plus !${ModID}:m2! *Gold for each card in your deck.
